game.title: The Lost Artifact
game.description: Embark on a quest to find the lost artifact and return it to its rightful place. The fate of the kingdom depends on you!
game.reward: 500 gold coins, a legendary weapon, and the gratitude of the king

task.description: Search for clues in the ancient library and talk to the wise old sage
Navigate through treacherous traps and defeat the guardian to find the hidden entrance to the cave
Battle the fierce dragon to reclaim the lost artifact
